SEARCH
Package source.Database.Dao

Interface StudentDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentDaoImpl
public interface StudentDao
The StudentDAO interface provides operations that follow the CRUD operations for persistent data storage. Also provides a method to get an entire list of students and delete them.
Since:
11/19/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • createStudent

      boolean createStudent(Student student)
      Creates a student in the subsequent database (perhaps for sign up feature~)
      Parameters:
      student - the student to add
      Returns:
      true if managed to create, false if not

    • readStudent

      Student readStudent(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads a student from the subsequent database using the student name
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      a student object if found, null if not.

      Student readStudent(DatabaseQuery[] queries)

      Returns:
      a student object if found, null if not.

    • readStudents

      ArrayList<Student> readStudents(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all students that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of students if found, an empty list if not.

    • readStudents

      ArrayList<Student> readStudents(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads all students that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      queries - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of students if found, an empty list if not.
